The Full Story

Dara worked in a garment factory for 8 years before deciding to change his life through technology. Despite having only a high school education and no prior tech experience, he enrolled in our Data Engineering program. Through determination and the academy's flexible evening schedule, he mastered Python, SQL, and cloud platforms. Today, he manages data infrastructure for one of Cambodia's largest e-commerce platforms, earning 5x his previous salary and inspiring his former colleagues to pursue tech careers.
